THE FEDERATION OF VETERAN AND ADAPTIVE EQUESTRIAN SPORTS OF UKRAINE
The Federation of Veteran and Adaptive Equestrian Sports of Ukraine was founded in 2018 by combat veteran Vasyl Irkha to promote and implement equestrian sports and hippotherapy among combat veterans with disabilities.

MAIN ACTIVITIES
The primary focus of our activities is the rehabilitation of combat veterans after limb amputations, as well as psychological support for veterans with PTSD.

To achieve this, we rent spaces for therapeutic horses at the Horse House Lviv stable.

üîπ military personnel and veterans,
üîπ individuals with disabilities due to combat injuries,

HORSE PARADISE SOCIAL RANCH
The ranch was founded near Kyiv in March 2023 with the goal of providing care for horses after their sports careers, rental services, or rescue from combat zones.

MAIN FOCUS
Our primary focus is the physical and psycho-emotional rehabilitation of animals.

At the same time, we have noticed a growing interest from veterans in visiting the ranch and interacting with horses. Therefore, in 2024, we began implementing a program for the psycho-emotional recovery of people through their interaction with horses.

MAIN PROGRAMS AT THE RANCH
üîπ Equine-Assisted Activities and Therapy
üîπ professional photo sessions,
üîπ excursions.

OUR VISITORS
üîπ children under 12,
üîπ teenagers aged 12‚Äì17,
üîπ local community children,
üîπ military personnel,
üîπ veterans,
üîπ veterans with disabilities,
üîπ families of veterans and military personnel,
üîπ internally displaced persons (IDPs),
üîπ business corporations.

Rehabilitation Center "Pride" Based at the "Zolota Pidkova" Equestrian Club

The "Zolota Pidkova" equestrian club has been operating since 2010. Its main focus is the youth riding school, staffed by professional specialists and trainers from the Mykolaiv Regional Equestrian Federation.

In 2020, the club expanded its services to include rehabilitation programs for children with disabilities. This initiative led to the establishment of the "Pride" NGO and the opening of a rehabilitation center in 2023. The center specializes in rehabilitating individuals with disabilities, veterans and their families, as well as internally displaced persons (IDPs) using equine-assisted therapy.

"EKOLIFE" CENTER FOR HEALTHY HORSEBACK RIDING AND ECOTOURISM

The "Ekolife" Center for Healthy Horseback Riding and Ecotourism is a public organization established in 2019 by ATO veteran Anatoliy Holovchenko and his wife, educator with special education, Tetiana Hekova. The center's mission is to develop and apply therapeutic/adaptive horseback riding and hippotherapy to support children and adults with special needs.

We provide psychological support and rehabilitation for veterans and children with special educational needs.

Private Stable EqueTerra

The private stable EqueTerra is located in the city of Dnipro, on the left bank, on a peninsula. This is a free-range, daytime stable that currently hosts private horses and actively collaborates with many visitors.

The owner of the stable is a specialist in working with horses using gentle methods. She provides consultation on feeding and horse care from PFA-Consult.

Private owners conduct training on their horses, and our territory is also used by the team, who work on rehabilitating soldiers and children.

The Equestrian Sports Federation in the Rivne Region was founded in 2020 based on the Equestrian Sports Club "Patriot" with the aim of developing equestrian sports in the Rivne region.

¬†We offer training and classes for equestrian enthusiasts and have been working in the field of hippovention since 2019.

Our programs are designed for children from 3 years old and adults who require physical and psychological recovery through interaction with horses.

PROGRAM EXPANSION AND REHABILITATION

The club is actively working on expanding its programs and creating conditions for rehabilitation, offering various activities for people with special needs.
Our trainers and hippovention specialists work with participants of all ages, ensuring an individual approach and high-level support.

DERHACHI CHILDREN'S AND YOUTH EQUESTRIAN SPORTS SCHOOL
Derhachi Children's and Youth Equestrian Sports School is an institution that provides opportunities for the development of equestrian sports among children and young people.

HISTORY AND RELOCATION
We began our activities in Derhachi, Kharkiv region. Due to the war in 2022, we relocated to Didivtsi village, Pryluky district, Chernihiv region.

MAIN ACTIVITIES
Our primary focus is horseback riding training, the development of sports skills, and participation in competitions for young riders.

We also actively collaborate with rehabilitation centers and public organizations, offering specialized programs for children with special needs.

Additionally, our school welcomes military personnel and their families, as well as SES (State Emergency Service) workers, organizing programs that assist in rehabilitation and adaptation through interaction with horses.
